contexts.context: (<mark>Spies</mark>) Russian spies have been found in Galicia lately...
(Spies) Russian <mark>spies</mark> have been found in Galicia lately, including some...
...officers who disclose military secrets to Russia. The <mark>spies</mark> have been arrested - Several officers and one captain...
...captain were put on trial in Warsaw. A <mark>spy</mark> has also been spotted in Paris. An official...
...making circles around our house. He lurks and <mark>spies</mark> upon us at every turn. I for myself...
...discovered that the cavalry captain Ivkov was a Japanese <mark>spy</mark>. He had already sold the Russian battle plan...
...a war. - Whether the Japanese military, Japanese <mark>spies</mark> or the Chinese destroyed it is not known....
London. News from Japan report that Japanese <mark>spies</mark> managed to destroy the Siberian railway in multiple places...
...Russian secret police to be stationed in Germany and <mark>spy</mark> out and denounce Russian Jewish people who migrated to...
